data.title: MacCoubrey Funeral Home Ltd.
data.text:
MESSAGES OF CONDOLENCE / DONATIONS

Karen Foote - August 12, 2024

Kim, I'm sorry to hear of Rob's passing. Only met him a couple of times, but I was glad that he did some work for me. Thinking of you and your family.

Carlie Douglas - August 12, 2024

Please know that we were devastated to learn of Rob‚Äôs death. It was a shock to all of us. Rob will be very kindly remembered by our entire family and we each have good memories of Rob. May God accompany him home. Our sincere sympathies, the Douglas family.

Donald Johnson - August 12, 2024

I was thinking about all at the funeral It‚Äôs really hard when you start to lose cousins

Cindy & Dennis Sherwin - August 11, 2024

Sending our deepest condolences to all the family.

Brad & Belinda Sherwin - August 11, 2024

It is with great sadness that we give our condolences to Kim and family on Rob's passing!

Ron mcbride - August 10, 2024

Kim and family so sorry to hear about this my heartfelt condolences he will be missed .

Kimberley Donegan - August 10, 2024

Dearest Kim and family! So Sorry to hear of Robs passing ! A great loss!

Janine Liboiron - August 10, 2024

RüïäÔ∏èIüïäÔ∏èPüïäÔ∏è Rob. May you soar with the AngelS in Light‚ú®and Love‚ù§Ô∏è My deepest sympathies and condolences Kim and Families and Friends and Loved Ones.

Max LeMarchant - August 10, 2024 DONATION

A Memorial Donation has been made to the following charity:

Addiction Research Foundation

Matt and Terra Diminie - August 10, 2024

Rylan, Mackenzie and Kim, I‚Äôm sorry to hear of Rob‚Äôs passing. Thinking of you and your family.

C.Marilyn Willis - August 10, 2024

To Kim and family...my sincerest sympathy‚ô•Ô∏è Many fond memories over the years.

Andrea Thomas - August 10, 2024

Kim, Mackenzie and Rylan, May the love and support of all friends and family strengthen you today. Papa, Michelle and Marie, May the memories and stories you share, fill all with fondness and tears of laughter. Love Andrea, Calvin, Cassie and Odessa

Karen Wells - August 10, 2024

My sincerest condolences to the family. Rob will be missed severely by family, his dogs and by his friends.

Shelley Thorne - August 10, 2024

My sincere condolences to the Thomas Family. So sad to hear of Robs passing. Thoughts & prayers are with you all. Rest easy Rob.

Marc Hodgkinson - August 9, 2024

I am deeply saddened to learn about the passing of Rob. Rob was kind, friendly, good natured guy that always had time and a smile for anyone he met. He will be missed by many.

Gail Scheepers - August 9, 2024 DONATION

A Memorial Donation has been made to the following charity:

Diabetes Canada

Gail Scheepers - August 9, 2024 DONATION

A Memorial Donation has been made to the following charity:

Diabetes Canada

Barb (Cameron) Schoeppe - August 9, 2024

Sending condolences and wishing peace to all who Rob held dear.

Max LeMarchant - August 9, 2024

Kim, My deepest sympathies and condolences to you and your family on the loss of Rob. Marc, Michelle, and Marie, My deepest sympathies and condolences to you on the loss of your brother, Rob. I will always remember Rob from the early days as a teenager when I was so fortunate to meet and spend time with the Thomas family, and then through our interactions in later years. Rob was so proud of his family and children and always had such an engaged outlook and smile. He was loved by many and will be dearly missed.

Dave Carr - August 9, 2024

So sorry for the news. My heart and thoughts are with him and Family. God Bless him and them.

Catherine Irwin - August 9, 2024

Struggling with the right words to say.....there aren't any...I am so incredibly sorry to all of you. Rob was such a unique and colourful person who lit up any room he walked into. A big presence who was loved by all. I loved working with him back in the "ole" days and being around his energy. He gave our home some magic with his renovation skills. He loved his family so much. So so sorry. Rest my friend in peace.

Eva Hall - August 9, 2024

Kim and Ryland. My heart is broken to hear of of Rob's passing. Rest now Rob. Eva.

Ken bracken - August 9, 2024

Rob was a great teammate and we shared many laughs in the room . My condolences to the Thomas family .

Terry Highfield - August 9, 2024

My condolences to the family. Rob and I played hockey against each other for many years. He was a great competitor! He'll be missed.

Deb Craig - August 9, 2024

Kim and all the Thomas Family, my deepest sympathies in the loss or Rob. He was always friendly with a smile and laugh and a kind soul. Sending healing hugs and prayers to you all. My sincere condolences

Kim Bryden - August 9, 2024

I'm so sorry to hear this news. Sending my deepest condolences to your family at this very difficult time. Rest in Peace now Rob üíú

Lori & Glenn Whiting - August 9, 2024

We are deeply saddened to learn of Rob's sudden passing - sending our most heartfelt condolences to Rylan, MacKenzie, Kim and families. Our family has so many fond memories of the Junior Cougars days, fun and friendship, travelling to hockey rinks across Ontario over many years. Rob's kind, polite and cheerful manner will never be forgotten. Rest easy Rob.

Dorothy Roberts - August 9, 2024

Thinking of you all in this very difficult time So sorry for your loss

Joan and Don Diminie and family - August 9, 2024

Thomas Family: So sorry to learn of your sad news, Rob will be missed. Our thoughts and prayers are with you at this difficult time.

Gordon Jibb - August 9, 2024

Worked with Rob at the School and had many conversations on the side of the road. Condolences to all the family. Gord Jibb

Katherine - August 9, 2024

Kim and family, know that you are in my thoughts and prayers at this very devastating time. Katherine Johns

Susan De Long (Cane) - August 8, 2024

Kim Rylan Michelle and family, so sorry for your loss. My memories of Rob date back to when we attended Burnham School together. I admired his talents in playing hockey and lacrosse. Thinking of you all üå∏ Susan

Kim CHRYSLER - August 8, 2024 DONATION

A Memorial Donation has been made to the following charity:

Camp Trillium

Mike McCurdy - August 8, 2024

Just read of Rob‚Äôs passing. The Thomas Family so sorry for your loss.

Donna and Bill Owens - August 8, 2024

Kim, Mackenzie and Rylan, our prayers and thoughts are with you during this difficult time.

Mark Wotton - August 8, 2024

So sorry to hear of Rob‚Äôs Passing. I knew him when he was younger as a good friend to my brother Scott and I know he and Scott maintained s as close friendship ask these years. Cherish the good memories!

Mark Wood - August 8, 2024

Very sad news, deepest condolences to the Thomas family, enjoyed being around Rob, a good friend..

Dale Barrett - August 8, 2024

So sorry to hear of Rob's passing. Such a considerate and caring person. My condolences to his family.

JoAnn Visaretis - August 8, 2024

Dear Sandy, Kim & family... I was deeply saddened to hear about the passing of Rob. Please accept my heartfelt condolences during this incredibly difficult time. Though words can never truly ease the pain you‚Äôre feeling, I hope you find comfort in the cherished memories you shared with Rob. I only met Rob a few times, he was a remarkable person, and his kindness and warmth will be remembered by everyone who had the privilege of knowing him. My thoughts are with you and your family as you navigate through this time of grief. Please don‚Äôt hesitate to reach out if there‚Äôs anything I can do to support you. With deepest sympathy, JoAnn

Cheryle Yarrow - August 8, 2024

I‚Äôm so sorry Kim for your loss. Hugs and kisses and love aunt cheryle

Brian and Steven Cosens - August 8, 2024

We are so sad to hear of Rob's passing. He was a wonderful person with a good heart and a great sense of humour ... and will be truly missed.

George Spalding - August 8, 2024

Kim and family , Mark , Michelle and Marie . So very sorry for your loss

Lois & Garry Hull Sr - August 8, 2024

Our memories of Rob are of his smile, laughter & humour. He was well known & well liked in his community. He will be missed & not forgotten. RIP Robüíô

Mary-Jane & Mark Tonello - August 8, 2024

Kim, Rylan & Mackenzie and families we are so sorry to hear of Rob‚Äôs passing. Lots of fun memories with Rob during Shawn & Rylan‚Äôs high school years. His gift for the gab and great sense of humour will be missed by many.

Bill Medhurst - August 7, 2024

Very sorry to hear of Rob‚Äôs Passing, and my sincere condolences to the Thomas family.

Hey and Sharon Hope - August 7, 2024

Kim, Rylan and Mackenzie So sorry to hear of Rob‚Äôs passing, please accept our sincere condolences.

Marc and Sarah Cowin - August 7, 2024

Kim, McKenzie, Rylan and families, we were surprised to hear of Robs passing. So many good memories of hockey, laughter, and friendship. Will always remember Rob with his smiling face! Keep your memories close. Sending our sincere condolences to all of you! So very sorry for your loss!

John and Carolyn Hyma - August 7, 2024

We are so sorry to hear of Rob‚Äôs passing. Our sincere condolences go out to the family.

Terry Andrews - August 7, 2024

So sorry to hear of Rob's passing. Your family is in our thoughts and prayers Kim. Marilyn and Terry Andrews.

Tamara mead - August 7, 2024

My thoughts and prayers go out to the family during these difficult times.

Cindy Stokes - August 7, 2024

Dear Kim, I am so sorry to hear about this sad news. Sending hugs and condolences to you and your family.

Terry Wells - August 7, 2024

Condolences to the Thomas family ... RIP Puffer

Sharon Lynn-Weese - August 7, 2024

Sincere condolences to the Thomas family. I am so sorry to learn of Rob's passing. He was a wonderful man

Kim Patton - August 7, 2024

Kim, my deepest condolences to you and your family.

Jenna & Mark Mills - August 7, 2024

Kim,Mackenzie, Rylan and family. We are sending you all our love and hope the good memories and stories carry you through this difficult time. We are thinking of you and are so sorry for your loss.

Michelle Wright (Diminie) - August 7, 2024

Sincere condolences to the Thomas Families

Mark Froncz - August 7, 2024

I am so sorry to hear this... my condolences Kim and family.

Dale Craig - August 7, 2024

Sending my condolences to Kim,Ryland and Mackenzie very sorry to learn the passing of Rob.

Daniel Emond - August 7, 2024

So sorry to learn of Rob's passing. My condolences to the entire Thomas Family.

Diane and Mark Saunders - August 6, 2024

Sincerest condolences for the passing of Rob. May you find comfort in sharing fond memories with friends and family. Always in your hearts.

Tracey & Gerard Morrison - August 6, 2024

Kim, Kenz & Ry Gerard and I are so sad by the passing of our dear brother-in-law, Rob. We have so many fun family memories that we will keep dear to our heart. His laughter and smile will always be etched in our memory forever along with the love he had for you all and of course his beloved pets. Rest Easy Rob, you will be missed by so many. Love forever Tracey & Gerard

Anne and Paul Burnham - August 6, 2024

Our sincere condolences to all of Rob's family at this difficult time.

Gail Scheepers - August 6, 2024

To the Thomas Family ... I am so very sorry for your loss. Rob was a great man with a huge heart. Rest in Paradise, my friend.

Rob and Kathleen Ugolini - August 6, 2024

Marc, Michelle, Marie, Kim and families. We are so sorry to hear of Rob's passing. Our sincerest condolences are with all of you at this extremely difficult time. May all your happy memories surround you today and always. God Bless

Greg Greavett - August 6, 2024

Condolences to the Thomas Family.

Raymond and Veronica Murphy - August 6, 2024

We are sending the whole family our deepest condolences. We were so sorry to hear about Rob's passing. ‚ù§Ô∏è‚ù§Ô∏è

Eileen Sheppard - August 6, 2024

Dear Kim and family, I'm so sorry to read of the passing of Rob. I always enjoyed having some great conversations with Rob, we would get laughing about high school days. Thinking of you during this difficult time, may the wonderful memories help with your healing. Sincerely Eileen Sheppard

Leslie Stewart+ - August 6, 2024

Oh Kim ,I am so sorry for hearing that Rob passed ! my sympathies to the whole Thomas Family xx

Glen Dunn - August 6, 2024

Marc, Michelle,Marie so sorry to hear about Rob's passing. Sending our condolences during this difficult time. RIP Rob.

Tom and Michele Heffernan - August 6, 2024

We are so very sorry to hear of Robs passing. Many great memories from school and hockey day's. Kim, Rylan, Mackenzie and the Thomas family our sincere condolences

Jonathan Mitchell - August 6, 2024

I was shocked and saddened to hear of Rob's passing. He was an all round good person and will be missed by everyone who knew him. RIP Rob

Linda Scott - August 6, 2024

My condolences to the Thomas family! Always remember Rob with a big smile and "how you doing, Scotty". Rob will always be in our hearts.

Bill and Carmel Scott - August 6, 2024

Kim, Michelle and families; Bill and I are sending you all a great big hug. Our thoughts and prayers are with you.

Martin Meade - August 6, 2024

Prayers for the family. Rest in peace Rob .

Linda Thomas - August 6, 2024

So sorry for your loss. May your memories of his life be with you always and help you in your grief. His spirit is with you while his body rests.

Linda Thomas Siveri - August 6, 2024

My condolences to All Our Thomas Family. Sorry to hear of Cousin Rob‚Äôs passing. My Heart ‚ù§Ô∏è goes out to You All üôèüèº üòì üíô Send Love, Hugs and Strength at this time of Missing Him. I didn‚Äôt meet Rob but we did talk on the phone when I was in Ontario. R. I. P. Dear Cousin üôèüèº üåà üå∫

Deanne O'Grady Spalding - August 6, 2024

Kim & family and Michelle & Marie - my sincere condolences for the loss of Rob. I hope your happy memories can help with such a big loss.

Paul Basinger - August 6, 2024

To Marc, Marie and Michelle. Please accept my condolences on Robs passing. Feels like I lost a little brother!

Terry Barrett - August 6, 2024

I pray for this beautiful family. Please know that the whole community is thinking of you all. Rob was so well known in Cobourg and beyond. A former neighbour, friend, and hockey teammate, I will miss him and treasure the laughs and memories. He will not be forgotten. RIP Rob.

Tom Briand - August 6, 2024

My Condolence to the family he will be missed.

Jane Hawthorne - August 6, 2024

So very sorry to hear of Rob‚Äôs passing. He had such a zest for life and was such a great guy. Besides working with Rylan, I will always remember him travelling with his dog wherever he went. RIP my friend.

Larry Landry - August 6, 2024

Rest in peace my friend

Alexandra MacBain - August 6, 2024

Kim and family Rob was a comedic guy, always joking and giving me a hard time. I will always remember him as a funny and caring individual. I am so sorry for your loss. I, and my family are thinking of you all at this most difficult time and sending all our love and strength. Xo

Linda Ryan - August 6, 2024

I‚Äôm heartbroken. Rob was a special person. He was loved and cared about by so many people. I‚Äôm thinking of the entire Thomas family during this extremely sad time. Rest In Peace Rob.

Jay Meade - August 6, 2024

Our sincere condolences to Mark, Michelle, Marie & families on the sad news of Robs passing. Rob had a big heart & was always up for some fun & humerous banter. An old family friend of my brothers. A good hockey player & teammate. RIP. Jay & families.

Leigh Russell - August 6, 2024

Sending heartfelt condolences to the Thomas family. Thinking of you all at this time.

Scott Clouston - August 6, 2024 DONATION

A Memorial Donation has been made to the following charity:

Northumberland Fare Share Food Bank

Mark and Laurie Caine - August 6, 2024

Our thoughts are with you all. RIP Rob

Rocco Ugolini and family - August 6, 2024

With heart felt sadness and a fond smile of memories I would like to express my condolences to Kim , Mackenzie , Rylan and families . Remembering Rob as a guy with a positive attitude and a sense of humour who could also make fun of himself . That kind of personality is rare . Glad to have been friends . Our prayers for you and your family . Rest in peace Rob .

Tom Coyle - August 6, 2024

My condolences to the Thomas family. Rob had a contagious smile and laugh that will be missed.

Kim CHRYSLER - August 6, 2024

sending condolences to the Thomas families. hold each other close and hold your memories close to your heart. RIP ROB!

Kim LaFontaine - August 6, 2024

Sending condolences to Rob's family during this difficult time.

Dave Washburn - August 6, 2024

So sorry to hear this news.....condolences to Kim and the entire family...so sorry.

Peggy Fredborg - August 6, 2024

We are sorry to hear the loss of your father/brother and friend. Sending our sincere condolences. He soars with our people now, rest in peace Rob.

Sandy Yorke - August 6, 2024

Sending our deepest condolences at this difficult time. We were very saddened to hear of Rob‚Äôs passing. üôèüèª üïäÔ∏è RIP Rob The Yorke Family

Pam and Dave Davidson - August 6, 2024

Sending our heartfelt condolences to the whole family. Rob will be remembered well.

Lucy Davies - August 6, 2024

Our condolences to you and your family during this very difficult time. May Rob RIP. Thinking about you all and keeping you in our prayers üôè ‚ù§Ô∏è

paolo lisa muia - August 6, 2024

kim makenzie rylan thomas My deepest condolences. Rob was an awesome man. He was a great friend and did anything for anybody. I will my deepest condolences. Rob was an awesome man. He was a great friend and did anything for anybody. I will miss him deeply. rest in peace, Rob

Carol Gutteridge - August 6, 2024

My thoughts and prayers are with everyone at this difficult time. Hold your memories close. RIP Rob.

Robert Wood - August 6, 2024

So sorry to hear of my of my old friends passing. RIP Rob . Woody

Denise & James White - August 6, 2024

Kenzie, Rylan & Kim, our deepest condolences for your loss of Rob. He was always so kind and warm to everyone. His unique love of furry friends made him extra special. May he rest in peace

Mike & Kim Behan - August 6, 2024

We were so sorry to hear about Rob's passing. We are sending the whole family our deepest condolences.

The Wannamaker Family - August 6, 2024

Dear Kim, Mackenzie and Rylan, We were very sorry to hear about Rob's passing. May you find strength in each other's love and comfort from family and friends. God Bless you, Brad,Debbie,Matt Adam and Joe Wannamaker

Chris Chapman - August 6, 2024

Sending my deepest condolences over your loss of Rob May he rest in Peace..

Katrina Rutherford - August 6, 2024

Condolences to all of the family and friends, hoping your memories bring peace and comfort at this difficult time.

Linda McDonald - August 6, 2024

Rylan, Sending condolences on the death of your dad. Linda and Malcolm McDonald

Kevin Oulahen - August 6, 2024

Very sorry to hear of Rob's passing. I had the pleasure of spending a lot of time with Rob through Sports, work, and school before I moved away. He was a great person to be around. My condolences to Kim and the kids and all other family members. Rest in peace my friend.

Susanne and Gord Jex - August 6, 2024

Our sincere condolences to all of the family. May your loving memories give you strength during this difficult time. We will remember Rob as a kind, friendly soul who always took the time to stop and chat and share a laugh.

Rick & Shirley McBride - August 6, 2024

Very sorry to hear of your loved ones passing. Cherish the memories

Violet - August 6, 2024

Derek & I are sending our sincere condolences to all .. RIP Rob

Mike Highfield - August 6, 2024

Sad news to hear of Robs passing. My condolences to the Thomas family and friends. Rest In Peace

Margaret and Rod MacKenzie - August 5, 2024

Kim, Rylan,Mackenzie and family‚Ä¶we were so sorry to hear of Rob‚Äôs passing. We were neighbours for many years. Our thoughts and prayers are with you.

Jill and David - August 5, 2024

To the Thomas Family, We are so very sorry to hear of Rob‚Äôs passing. Wishing you comfort and peace to face the days ahead and loving memories to hold in your heart. May Rob rest in peace üôè

Peter Murray and wife Mhairi Carr - August 5, 2024

My husband, Peter Murray, who worked for Rob for a few years will miss him. And although I never worked for him, we used to run into him often at the (elgin st.) Rodery Park. We talked often and he will be missed. He was outgoing and in our short talks, talked so often of his kids and grand-children. Our hearts go out to you and yours Kim. You've been his "Rock" as he described.

Michael Banks - August 5, 2024

Our condolences to Rob's family.

Ashley-Anne Westlake - August 5, 2024

Kim and family I am so sorry for your loss! My condolences are with you at this hard time. Rob was such an amazing man who always put a smile on everyone's face, he will be greatly missed!

Ashley-Anne Westlake - August 5, 2024

Kim and family I am so sorry for your loss! My condolences are with you at this hard time. Rob was such an amazing man who always put a smile on everyone's face, he will be greatly missed!

Brenda Blakeman Speiran - August 5, 2024

Sorry to hear of Rob's passing. My sincere condolences to the entire Thomas family. May he rest in Peace üôè.

Anonymous - August 5, 2024

Who could not love that face. A good pal gone. Rob had a heart of gold and was a spirited man who brought life and pleasure to any conversation. He will never be forgotten by many, and missed by more RIP BROTHER. Our condolences to Kim and all family members,we are thinking and praying for you all in this season of great loss.

Adam Wainwright - August 5, 2024

My condolences to the family. Rob was a kind man

Beth and Paul - August 5, 2024

So very sorry to hear of Rob‚Äôs passing. Our heartfelt condolences to the entire Thomas family.

Raymond and Nettie Thomas - August 5, 2024

Nettie and I would like to give our most sincere condolence to all the family for the loss of Rob. Our thoughts and prayer are with you.

Dawn Davis - August 5, 2024

Kim and family. Sending my deepest condolences to you. So sorry to hear of Rob's passing. ‚ù§Ô∏è

Denise - August 5, 2024

A very kind and unique soul. Love the family you created together with Kim and know how hard you will be missed. May you rest in peace. May your family find the comfort they need in the memories and love you all shared.

Stacy & Kevin Warner - August 5, 2024

Such sad news. MacKenzie, Rylan and Kim we send hugs and wish you all peace. RIP Rob

Samantha and David Laramee and Family - August 5, 2024

Our deepest sympathies to Mackenzie and family. Sending our thoughts, prayers, and love to you all.

Shirley Foden - August 5, 2024

My sincere condolences to the entire Thomas family. May your cherished memories help you through the difficult days ahead. Rest in peace, Rob

Rob and Joanne West - August 5, 2024

Our deepest sympathies Kim , Rylan and Mackenzie , and to your families,also to Marc, Marie and Michelle,may you be comforted by fond memories during this tough time, we'll be thinking of you

Cassie Thomas - August 5, 2024

So much love. May uncle rob rest in heaven. He will be missed by so many. My condolences‚ù§Ô∏è

Rob and Lorraine Harnden - August 5, 2024

Rylan, Mackenzie, Kim and families: May your dad/Rob rest in peace. May the memories of the good times flood your grief so healing can begin. Thinking of you.

Helen Ann Parker - August 5, 2024

Marc , Michelle and Family, So sorry to hear of Rob's passing. Wonder if he is playing hockey with Terry in Heaven. Please accept my deepest sympathy at this sad time. Thinking of you. Stay strong.

Jane &Dale Colbary - August 5, 2024

Kim and Family Very sorry to hear RIP

Carolyn Flannigan - August 5, 2024

I‚Äôm sorry to hear of Robs passing . I had a great chat with him recently at Pizza Pizza . He was always so kind and friendly every time I ran into him . My heartfelt condolences to Kim and family and the entire Thomas family . My thoughts and prayers are with you at this difficult time . RIP Rob

Sharon Harvey - August 5, 2024

Rylan and family‚Ä¶I am so very sad to hear of Rob‚Äôs passing. Please accept our condolences. üòî Sharon & Brad Harvey

Gord Burdick - August 5, 2024

Sorry to hear about Rob‚Äôs passing. I won‚Äôt be able to attend as my son Dylan is getting married. Nothing but love for the Thomas family. ‚ù§Ô∏è

Cheryl and Garry Hull - August 5, 2024

Our deepest condolences to the whole family. We will always remember the laughter and the good times we had. Rest In Peace Rob.

Rosanne Millar - August 5, 2024

My sincere condolences to you Kim and your family. ü´Ç

Louise Calnan - August 5, 2024

I am so sorry to hear about your loss Marie. My sincere condolences to you and your family.

Allyson - August 5, 2024 DONATION

A Memorial Donation has been made to the following charity:

Adopt a Dog, Save a Life

CHRISTINE BEVAN - August 5, 2024

Our sincere condolences to all of you during this difficult time. Hold fast to the very special memories you all cherish. RIP Rob. Love and light Christine and Max Bevan

Allyson Stothart - August 5, 2024

My Dearest Kim, Rylan, MacKenzie and family, sending my sincerest condolences to you all for the loss of your beloved Rob, father, grandfather, brother and friend! May Creator comfort you all during your days ahead and know he is resting Free in the spirit of Creator!! Prayers and Love to you all xo

Joe Ferguson - August 5, 2024

So Sorry to hear the passing of Rob.Sending our condolences to the family at this difficult time.Joe Ferguson and Cindy Greer

Brian Chapman - August 5, 2024

I'm very sorry to hear of Robs passing and would like to offer my personal sincere condolences to all of the family.

Tammy and Murray Davey - August 5, 2024

Sending our deepest condolences to Kim and family at this difficult time.

Bryan Marjoram and Cindy - August 5, 2024

Kim, Mackenzie, Rylan, and the entire Thomas family, Whenever I met up with Rob we'd always have a good chat and lots of laughs. He had a great sense of humour! He was a gifted athlete and a real people person. He truly loved all of you. Cherish the good times and fun-filled memories from the past. He will be sorely missed by his many friends and acquaintances. Please accept our sincere condolences. You are all in our thoughts and prayers during this difficult time. Robert Denis 'Rob' Thomas December 3, 1962 - July 30, 2024 ~ Rest In Peace ~

Phyllis & Paul - August 5, 2024

Rylan, so sorry for the loss of your dad. Sending our condolences to the family at this difficult time. Our thoughts and prayers are with you all at this sad time. Phyllis & Paul

Johnene and Earl Proctor - August 5, 2024

So sorry to hear of Rob‚Äôs passing. Our thoughts are with you Kim, Rylan and MacKenzie.

Reg & Kim Ward - August 5, 2024

Kim, Mackenzie & Rylan, we were stunned & saddened to hear about Rob‚Äôs passing. Cherish your memories of the kind man that he was. Our thoughts and prayers are with you.

Dave Glover - August 5, 2024

So terribly sorry to hear of your loss. He was one of kind,& I'll fondly remember our times Shared over a pint. He was always someone who could enjoy the company of others. I wish his family great comfort in their time of loss & reflection. Knowing he'll live on in each of the lives he touched. Strong in the knowledge that this isn't goodbye as we will meet up again, probably by a an open campfire with guitars playing & laughter echoing thru the trees.

john mcewen - August 5, 2024

Remember the good times and cherish them. In my prayers.

Anne and Bob Lafontaine - August 5, 2024

Our deepest condolences to all of the family. We‚Äôre thinking of you during this difficult time.
